Death Defied.name: Death Defied
Death Defied.blurb: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells for 7 seconds.
Death Defied.description: Innate: Upon taking fatal damage, Karthus remains active for 7 seconds, rendering himself unable to move, attack, or use active items, but becoming  untargetable and  invulnerable for the duration as well as being able to use abilities at no cost.
Death Defied.description2: If  Defile has been learned, it will remain toggled on for Death Defied's entire duration at no mana cost.
Death Defied.notes:
* Death Defied will always trigger after revival effects ( Guardian Angel,  Chronoshift).
 At the start of Death Defied, Karthus is set to  1 health.
 Karthus can still regenerate his health over the duration, but he will always die at the end of it.
 Due to this fact, Karthus gains large benefit from  Last Stand for most of his passive.

 Karthus will still benefit from  cooldown reduction during Death Defied.
 After Death Defied ends, the corpse of Karthus will retain unit collision despite being dead on the ground.

Lay Waste.name: Lay Waste
Lay Waste.blurb: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
Lay Waste.description: Active: After a 0.5-second delay, Karthus detonates the target area in the cursor's direction, dealing  magic damage to all enemies within, doubled when hitting only one target.
Lay Waste.leveling:
Magic Damage:
45 / 65 / 85 / 105 / 125 (+ 30% AP)
Enhanced Magic Damage:
90 / 130 / 170 / 210 / 250 (+ 60% AP)
Lay Waste.notes:
* Applies  spell damage if it hits a single target and  area damage if it hits multiple targets.
 Lay Waste briefly grants  sight of the target area before detonation.
 Lay Waste plays a different sound effect and uses a cosmetic critical strike when it only hits one target.

Wall of Pain.name: Wall of Pain
Wall of Pain.blurb: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Movement Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.
Wall of Pain.description: Active: Karthus creates a transparent wall at the target location for 5 seconds and grants  sight around it.
Wall of Pain.description2: For the duration, all units who cross it are both  slowed for 4 seconds, reduced by 50% over the first second, decaying over its duration and  lose 15% magic resistance for the same duration.
Wall of Pain.notes:
* The wall casts perpendicular to Karthus'  location.
 The  sight is granted around Wall of Pain's pillars but not the wall itself.
 Wall of Pain can only affect any given unit once per cast.

Defile.name: Defile
Defile.blurb: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.
Defile.description: Toggle Off: Karthus restores  mana whenever he kills a unit.
Defile.description2: Toggle On: Karthus deals magic damage per second to all nearby units.
Defile.notes:
* Defile also restores  mana if Karthus destroys an enemy structure.
 Defile will automatically toggle on during  Death Defied.

Requiem.name: Requiem
Requiem.blurb: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.
Requiem.description: Active: Karthus channels for 3 seconds and deals magic damage to all targetable enemy  champions upon its completion.
Requiem.notes:
* Requiem's channel is telegraphed to all enemy champions by a beam of light that descends on all targets.
 There is no visible beam if the enemy champion respawns during Requiem's channel, yet damage is applied normally.

 Karthus cannot cast Requiem if  Death Defied's duration is less than 3 seconds.
